body:
For my pc i have a 24"' LED MONITOR and my xbox has a old ish 22" tv 

i might have 2 19" lg tvs new ish,

should i put the 2 19" lg tvs on my pc and my 24" led monitor for xbox and my old xbox tv can go somewhere :)

replies.body: And there are people willing to blow $1100 on a MacBook to play minecraft. Very few people spend $2000 on a pc to play minecraft, the most you'll need to pay is about $600. Don't bring an apple product into a post about things not being worth their price.

replies.body:
I'll be a bit ontopic if you haven't done your setup yet.

At the end its down to personal choice and what suits you best but I would recommend having the bigger monitor for your console and having the two monitors for your computer.

If your computer can handle a dual-monitor setup without any massive FPS drops you should be good to go. Having a dual-monitor setup not only lets you play games but you can do tons of other stuff on the second monitor like watching videos, movies or even reading the forums.

Just make sure you hook it all up like you want it to be
